name: 20 Scary Levels
description:
Welcome To The Most Difficult Game I've Ever Made! It's Inspiring Of Roblox Doors But I Made On Unity! Some Of The Monsters Are From Other Games And Some Of Them Are From Some Of My Games!

CREDITS:

Minecraft

Roblox Doors

Search The Bread

Creepyface

Nextbots

Story: Oh Noes! Looks Like You Wanted To Go To A Ice Cream Shop But It Was'nt A Ice Cream Shop, It's A Big Trap So You Got Teleported In The Mansion! So You Need To Pass 20 Scary Levels To Go In A Boss Battle And Find Steven's Friends To Win! If Levels Are Scary It's Not Only Scary But It's Also Dangerous Because All 20 Levels Have Monsters! So Good Luck If You Are Ready!
